module.name: SMS Router Module for Dinstar
module.description: Opens a two-way SMS and MMS routing between a Dinstar sim gateway and a FreePBX instance
module.changelog: ### v0.1.2 - added a configuration page under `Connectivity -> Dinstar SMS Routing`. ### v0.1.1 - added manual port number and extension number mapping. - added installation instructions. ### v0.1.0 - initial implementation.
